summary: I STARTED HAVING HAD BRAKE PROBLEMS WITH THE VECHICLE AFTER ABOUT 5000 MILES. THE DEALER CORRECTED THE PROBLEM BUT IT HAS RETURNED - ONLY MORE  EXTREME. I WAS RECENTLY DRIVING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS AND ATTEMPTED TO STOP AND ALMOST LOST CONTOL BECAUSE OF THE FRONT END SHIMMY DUE TO ROTOR WARPAGE. THE FRONT END SHIMMY IS NOT AS EXTREME AT LOWER SPEEDS. I CONTACTED THE DEALER AND WAS TOLD THAT THE WARRANTY HAS EXPIRED.I HAVE ONLY 20,000 MILES ON THE VECHICLE.
